ui.description: A 25-item assessment revealing your authentic approach to romance and relationships

guide.ipipId: IPIP-DS-25 (Dating Style Assessment, based on Big Five)
guide.purpose: This assessment helps you understand your dating approach and relationship patterns. It is for self-awareness only and not a diagnostic tool.
guide.instruction: Based on the last 2-4 weeks, honestly answer how much each statement applies to you.
guide.interpretation: Higher scores indicate stronger tendencies in that trait, while lower scores indicate weaker tendencies.

AC.name: Active Pursuit
AC.detail: You actively seek partners and express interest openly. You are comfortable with new romantic encounters and feel at ease sharing your feelings.
AC.tip: Higher scores mean you initiate and pursue connections actively; lower scores mean you prefer waiting for others' signals.

CA.name: Cautious Approach
CA.detail: You evaluate potential partners carefully and value deep connections. You prefer understanding someone thoroughly before committing emotionally.
CA.tip: Higher scores indicate thoughtfulness and caution; lower scores indicate spontaneity and emotional immediacy.

IE.name: Independent Expression
IE.detail: You clearly express your feelings and needs while valuing personal freedom. You maintain independence even within relationships.
IE.tip: Higher scores mean you assert boundaries and maintain autonomy; lower scores mean you accommodate your partner's needs.

RE.name: Relationship-Centered
RE.detail: You prioritize your partner's needs and emotions. You seek deep intimacy and show strong commitment in relationships.
RE.tip: Higher scores indicate deep emotional engagement; lower scores indicate preference for emotional distance.

items.text: When I meet someone I'm attracted to, I make the first move to contact them.
I enjoy meeting new people and exploring romantic possibilities.
I directly express my feelings to someone I'm interested in.
I feel anxious about starting new romantic relationships.
I prefer to wait for the other person to show interest before I act.
I tend to hide my feelings when I develop romantic interest.
I actively try not to miss opportunities to start new relationships.
I take time to think carefully before starting a relationship with someone new.
I wait to understand someone's true character before revealing deeper feelings.
I thoughtfully evaluate my compatibility with a potential partner.
I tend to fall for someone quickly on a first date.
I make relationship decisions based on emotional impulses.
I lose interest quickly if I notice flaws in someone I'm dating.
I need adequate personal time and space even when in a relationship.
I clearly express my thoughts and needs in romantic relationships.
I prefer to maintain my independence rather than become dependent on my partner.
I'm willing to sacrifice my plans and dreams for my partner.
I often hide my opinions to accommodate my partner's preferences.
I feel the need to control my partner's actions and decisions.
I'm sensitive to my partner's emotional state.
I prioritize caring for my partner and their happiness.
I deeply value intimate and meaningful connection with my partner.
I don't easily notice changes in my partner's emotions.
I prefer to maintain emotional distance in my relationships.
I often feel lonely in my romantic relationships.

ranges.title: Very Low
ranges.description: This trait is very weak in your approach.
ranges.recommendation: Understand your current patterns and practice adjusting when needed.

ranges.title: Low
ranges.recommendation: Respect your natural tendencies while developing flexibility when the situation calls for it.

ranges.title: High
ranges.recommendation: Use your strength wisely while watching for imbalances.

ranges.title: Very High
ranges.recommendation: Channel your strength positively and work toward balance.
